title: Address Tenant Noise Complaint
description: A tenant emails to complain about a noisy neighbor's late-night parties. The PM must address the issue.

tasks.description: Acknowledge receipt of the complaining tenant's email and thank them for the information.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional and empathetic email response is sent to the tenant who made the complaint.

tasks.description: Review the lease agreement for the accused tenant, specifically the 'quiet enjoyment' clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the relevant lease clause regarding noise.

tasks.description: Send a formal 'Lease Violation Warning' notice to the tenant accused of being noisy.
tasks.expected_outcome: A standard warning notice is generated and sent, and the action is logged in both tenants' communication logs.
